pages.text: I have discovered that lapis lazuli focuses the energy of the red anomalies, I will called this energy $(blue_magic). Now that I have samples of $(blue_magic) in the form of $(blue_magic) Irradiated Lapis I can begin investigating its uses. It seems to have an affinity for offense, so I've designed a simple charm that should increase the damage done by any sword.
I simply need to combine the sword with a little $(blue_magic) Irradiated Lapis.
